original_text:
On every side the wicked prowl,
    as vileness is exalted among the children of man.
korean_text: 비열함이 인생 중에 높임을 받는 때에 악인들이 곳곳에서 날뛰는도다

sentences.original_text: On every side the wicked prowl
as vileness is exalted among the children of man.
sentences.korean_translation: 비열함이 인간들 사이에서 존귀히 여김을 받으니.
